title: RateFlix
description: A Golang based movie rating application, based on movie data dump from TMDB. JWT Authenticated APIs for rating movies and fetching.

title: Crowdfunding
description: A decentralized fundraising model utilizing smart contracts, built with Solidity and Remix-IDE.

title: DineCraft
description: A Golang-based restaurant management system to streamline operations, enhance customer experiences, and optimize performance.
